      • Knight

        public Knight​(int row,
              int col,
              Color color)
       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructs a Knight chessPiece with specified color and a representation of its position in rows and columns.
        Parameters:
        row - x-axis position of the chess piece.
        col - y-axis position of the chess piece.
        color - specific color of the piece.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is invalid
